objects.description: [Black Basta](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1070) can encrypt files with the ChaCha20 cypher and using a multithreaded process to increase speed.(Citation: Minerva Labs Black Basta May 2022)(Citation: BlackBerry Black Basta May 2022)(Citation: Cyble Black Basta May 2022)(Citation: NCC Group Black Basta June 2022)(Citation: Uptycs Black Basta ESXi June 2022)(Citation: Deep Instinct Black Basta August 2022)(Citation: Palo Alto Networks Black Basta August 2022)(Citation: Trend Micro Black Basta Spotlight September 2022)(Citation: Check Point Black Basta October 2022)
